zh.expks_hint_txt_point1: 通过Keystore他人可以轻易的进入并控制您的账户，请勿与他人共享，以防资产受到损失
zh.expks_hint_txt_point2: 请勿在线上传输未加密过的Keystore，否则一旦Keystore被盗，您的资产将受到威胁
zh.expks_hint_txt_point3: 在不使用时，请将Keystore保存在离线的安全设备中
zh.expksqrc_hint_txt_point1: 请确保周围没有他人或设备监控您的屏幕
zh.expksqrc_txtbox_txt_content: 请确保周围没有他人或设备监控您的屏幕

en.expks_hint_txt_point1: The Keystore is the access to your account, please don’t share it with others, or you could lose all your assets
en.expks_hint_txt_point2: Don’t transfer the unencrypted Keystore online, it easily gets hacked and result in asset loss.
en.expks_hint_txt_point3: Please store the Keystore in a safe hardware, and keep it offline when unused
en.expksqrc_hint_txt_point1: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
en.expksqrc_txtbox_txt_content: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
